biotools.summary: Independent predictor using Fuzzy K-Nearest Neighbor algorithm, used to predict ion channel-drug interactions. It can be used to identify a pair as Ion channel-drug pair or non-Ion channel drug pair according to the sequence of protein and the molecular fingerprint of drug.

bioschemas.name: iCDI-PseFpt
bioschemas.summary: Independent predictor using Fuzzy K-Nearest Neighbor algorithm, used to predict ion channel-drug interactions. It can be used to identify a pair as Ion channel-drug pair or non-Ion channel drug pair according to the sequence of protein and the molecular fingerprint of drug.
